Buttons

John Coene

2018-06-22

buttons.Rmd

sigmajs lets you add buttons to trigger events, in static documents, such as this one.

nodes <- sg_make_nodes() 
edges <- sg_make_edges(nodes, 17)

sigmajs() %>% 
  sg_nodes(nodes, id, size) %>% 
  sg_edges(edges, id, source, target) %>% 
  sg_force_start() %>% 
  sg_button("start layout", "force_start", class = "btn btn-success")

Events that can be triggered via a button:

  • force_start
  • force_stop
  • noverlap
  • drag_nodes
  • relative_size
  • add_nodes
  • add_edges
  • drop_nodes
  • drop_edges
  • animate

Developed by John Coene.

Site built with pkgdown.
